diagnosis:
⚠️ PROCESS ISSUE DETECTED

BDV and ACC passed, but DDE failed.

This indicates process or pipeline issues. The implementation meets user needs and is architecturally sound, but quality gates or execution compliance checks are failing.

Action: Tune quality gates, fix pipeline configuration, or address missing artifacts/contracts.
recommendations: Complete all DDE nodes in the execution manifest
Fix failed quality gates (coverage, lint, security scans)
Lock all interface contracts before dependent work begins

issues: SAST scan found 2 medium severity issues
